lastfmr
  • Reference

Get information about a user profile.

Get information about a user profile. Implementation of last.fm's user.getInfo API method (http://www.last.fm/api/show/user.getInfo).

user_getInfo(user, api_key = lastkey)

Arguments

user

The user to fetch info for.
api_key

A Last.fm API key.

Value

A list of user profile information

Examples

user_getInfo("platyjus")
#> $name
#> [1] "platyjus"
#> 
#> $image
#>                                                                                #text
#> 1     https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/34s/09b1ff0164e9c676385920bbd1e0af81.png
#> 2     https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/64s/09b1ff0164e9c676385920bbd1e0af81.png
#> 3    https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/174s/09b1ff0164e9c676385920bbd1e0af81.png
#> 4 https://lastfm-img2.akamaized.net/i/u/300x300/09b1ff0164e9c676385920bbd1e0af81.png
#>         size
#> 1      small
#> 2     medium
#> 3      large
#> 4 extralarge
#> 
#> $url
#> [1] "https://www.last.fm/user/platyjus"
#> 
#> $country
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> $age
#> [1] "0"
#> 
#> $gender
#> [1] "n"
#> 
#> $subscriber
#> [1] "0"
#> 
#> $playcount
#> [1] "6010"
#> 
#> $playlists
#> [1] "0"
#> 
#> $bootstrap
#> [1] "0"
#> 
#> $registered
#> $registered$`#text`
#> [1] 1459304044
#> 
#> $registered$unixtime
#> [1] "1459304044"
#> 
#> 
#> $type
#> [1] "user"
#>
